text: Nocardiopsis trehalosi is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from soil.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis trehalosi at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 1981
title: Nocardiopsis trehalosi
